context_analysis.email_summary: Healthcare enrollment clarification and opt-out request needs attention
context_analysis.energy_patterns: Energy level 7/10 - good for productive work in morning, social activity midday, and household tasks in evening

reasoning.scheduling_strategy: Front-load echo dev work before golf (6:00-9:30), use post-golf afternoon for household tasks and meal planning. Evening reserved for final house prep and potential grocery run.
reasoning.energy_optimization: Leverage high morning energy for focused dev work. Golf provides active break. Afternoon tasks are less cognitively demanding, suitable for post-activity energy dip.
reasoning.priority_sequencing: 1) Echo dev (most important objective), 2) Golf commitment (fixed time), 3) House cleaning, 4) Meal planning, 5) Grocery shopping (if time allows)
reasoning.recovery_planning: Built-in recovery through golf activity and lighter afternoon tasks. Evening wind-down before Hunter's arrival allows for relaxation.

key_insights: Morning echo dev work leverages peak energy before golf commitment
Healthcare task scheduled before leaving to avoid forgetting
Afternoon reserved for household tasks when energy naturally dips
Grocery shopping marked as optional based on available time
Schedule ensures house is ready well before Hunter's arrival
